Sentencas: A typical biogas system with three utilization pathways, i. e., biogas upgrading, biogas combined heat and power (CHP), biogas solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) were designed.
Titulo: Energetic-environmental-economic assessment of the biogas system with three utilization pathways: Combined heat and power, biomethane and fuel cell

Sentencas: It was assessed from the viewpoint of energy, environment and economy by using energy efficiency, green degree and net present value index respectively.
Titulo: Energetic-environmental-economic assessment of the biogas system with three utilization pathways: Combined heat and power, biomethane and fuel cell

Sentencas: The assessment considered the trade-off relationships among these indexes, which is more comprehensive than previous systematic evaluation work only included single or two of the pathway(s) by using one or two of the index(es).
Titulo: Energetic-environmental-economic assessment of the biogas system with three utilization pathways: Combined heat and power, biomethane and fuel cell

Sentencas: Assessment results indicated that biogas upgrading pathway has the highest systematic energy efficiency (46.5%) and shortest payback period (8.9 year) with the green degree production is the lowest (9.29 gd/day).
Titulo: Energetic-environmental-economic assessment of the biogas system with three utilization pathways: Combined heat and power, biomethane and fuel cell

Sentencas: While for biogas SOFC pathway, although the green degree production is the highest (21.77 gd/day), the payback period is longer (14.5 year) and the energy efficiency is 13.6% lower than the biogas upgrading pathway.
Titulo: Energetic-environmental-economic assessment of the biogas system with three utilization pathways: Combined heat and power, biomethane and fuel cell
